description.value:
Primary Energy: Space 4 (negating magical effects) Supporting Energy: Space 2 (medium range) Range: Medium, 60 ft. Duration: Instantaneous Total Cost: 6 Energy Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Space Potential + Space Mastery Effect: End one magical effect on a creature, object, or area. Compare your weaving successes to the original caster's successes. If you equal or beat them, effect ends. Can target multiple effects (weakest first). Saving Throw: Opposed weaving check (Your Space weaving vs Original caster's weaving) Success Scaling: Must equal or exceed original weaving successes to dispel

---

V
